title: adidas ad font
content:
can any body know this adidas ad font???

 [‹ "Coffee Is Culinary" 40s style thin condensed sans on Starbucks recipe card](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215102537/http:/typophile.com/node/36759 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Yamanote Line "You are here" - Helvetica {Florian} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215102537/http:/typophile.com/node/36935 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wong98

comments.content: but i know it’s not PTL’s note soft,and maybey other similar..

Hey, you already asked this one! And we identified your font — see your previous thread [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215102537/http:/typophile.com/node/36950). Try to [keep track of your own posts](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215102537/http:/typophile.com/user/21584/track) please. ;^)
I will delete this thread in a couple of hours.

[Cachet](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215102537/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/cachet_bold/?sample_text=RUN%20AT%20THE%20SPEED%20OF%20CHAT&sample_size=28). These ads are all over San Francisco and they ain’t bad.

[More about Cachet](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215102537/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/376692648/).

Wong what are PTL’s? Did you need an alternative to Cachet?

Mikey :-)

hi Mikey,PTL is the PrimeType Library.

n thank you Stephen Coles !!

ohh... You were referring to this face:

[http://www.primetype.com/faces\_info.php?fid=34](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215102537/http:/www.primetype.com/faces_info.php?fid=34 "http://www.primetype.com/faces\_info.php?fid=34")

To follows Yves admonition: sign into Typophile, click my account, then click track under the big letters of your user name. There you can see all your posts you have made and if others are responding to them.

Also please be sure to check out Typophile FAQ:

[http://typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215102537/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq "http://typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq")

Have fun of Typophile and welcome!

Mikey :-)
